MUST WATCH

Fatal UK stabbing declared terror incident by police

A fatal stabbing in Reading, England, has now been declared a terror incident by UK Police. Six people in Reading's Forbury Gardens were attacked by a 25-year-old male; three people were reported dead after the stabbing and another three sustained serious injuries, according to local police officials.

Source: CNN
